meanings.sent1: The autosuggesting feature on my phone predicts the words I want to type.
meanings.sent2: The autosuggesting function in the search bar helps me find what I need faster.
meanings.sent3: The autosuggesting tool in the email app made me laugh when it suggested a funny emoji.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like an autosuggesting machine, always offering solutions before I even asked.
meanings.sent5: The autosuggesting software made the process so efficient that I finished in record time.

meanings.definition: The act of suggesting or providing suggestions automatically.
meanings.sent1: I appreciate the autosuggesting of relevant articles on the website.
meanings.sent2: The autosuggesting of movies based on my preferences is quite helpful.
meanings.sent3: The autosuggesting of random dance moves during the meeting caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent4: His speech had an autosuggesting quality, guiding the audience towards his main point effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The autosuggesting of new music introduced me to some amazing artists I had never heard of before.
